Title: Implement weighted sum of pattern
Description: Implement a way to sum patterns for active antennae composite pattern rendering.

Title: Use Cartopy instead of BASEMAP
Description: Cartopy seems to be the rising star in term of cartography and display. Investigate possibility and effort to switch to cartopy if Basemap is abandonated. Also consider using only Pyproj and Matplotlib.

Title: Align displayed element behaviour
Description: All displayed elements inherit from Element class. They should be plotted, cleared and configured using the same routines. Edit/Remove menu options should be available in the GUI.
